alert.note: Alert for Clackamas; Marion (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 05 at 7:12PM PST until January 10 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oregon... Pudding River at Aurora affecting Clackamas and Marion Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pudding River at Aurora. * WHEN...From late Friday night to early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Above 22.0 feet, expect minor flooding of low-lying agricultural lands and access roads along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM PST Wednesday the stage was 19.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Saturday morning and continue rising to 22.1 feet Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning.
